name: Valeriana iganciana

name: Valeriana sobraliana
distribution: Santa Catarina (Brazil South, Brazil, Southern America);Paraná (Brazil South, Brazil, Southern America);
remarks: doi:10.11646/phytotaxa.423.1.2 The new species is named in honour of the Brazilian botanist Marcos Sobral, great researcher and collector of Valerianaceae in Southern Brazil, the first to mention the morphological specificities of the material here analyzed.
